channel.title: CVE Feed for ChanGate EnterPrise Co., Ltd -- property management system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ChanGate EnterPrise Co., Ltd -- property management system

item.title: CVE-2021-22857|2024-08-03T18:51:07.484Z -- changate%20enterprise%20co.%2C%20ltd -- property%20management%20system
item.description: The CGE page with download function contains a Directory Traversal vulnerability. Attackers can use this loophole to download system files arbitrarily.

item.title: CVE-2021-22856|2024-08-03T18:51:07.468Z -- changate%20enterprise%20co.%2C%20ltd -- property%20management%20system
item.description: The CGE property management system contains SQL Injection vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can inject SQL commands into the parameters in Cookie and obtain data in the database without privilege.

item.title: CVE-2021-22858|2024-08-03T18:51:07.560Z -- changate%20enterprise%20co.%2C%20ltd -- property%20management%20system
item.description: Attackers can access the CGE account management function without privilege for permission elevation and execute arbitrary commands or files after obtaining user permissions.
